# FFTRadix

**Type Alias**

The size of the FFT decomposition.

## Declaration

```swift
typedef int FFTRadix;
```

## Discussion

An `FFTRadix` value is passed as an argument to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/kernel/1580009-vdsp_create_fftsetup] or [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_create_fftsetupD].

## Constants

- **kFFTRadix2**
- **kFFTRadix3**
- **kFFTRadix5**: Specifies a radix of 5.
title: FFTRadix
